notes: Iconic suicide doors (rear-hinged) design. Presidential limousine variant (JFK assassination vehicle). Last four-door convertible in America until 1980s. Unibody construction. Highly collectible. Vintage complexity requires specialized service knowledge. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lincoln Continental article, January 2025 revision.

Revival of Mark series as personal luxury coupe. Based on Ford Thunderbird platform. Signature Rolls-Royce-style grille. Hidden headlights. Long hood, short deck proportions. Vintage service requirements. Data sourced from Wikipedia Lincoln Mark series article, January 2025 revision.
